bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad XC Ultra lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, SST tubing diameters, PressFit30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chainstay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox F29 RL,15QR thru axle system, lever-actuated lockout, air spring pressure, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Sun/Ringle Black Flag Expert 29"w/ StanJAMIS_SINGLEQUOTEs NoTubes technology, 24mm width, sealed cartridge bearing hubs w/ straight-pull Wheelsmith double butted spokes
Shimano XT M780 Shadow rear and SLX M661 34.9mm top pull front
Ritchey Mountain Comp flat bar, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 660mm
Ritchey Comp 2 bolt OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
